clues.clue: One of its national symbols is on its flag, seen here

flight attendant:

Boswell quotes him, asked to compare 2 poets: "There is no settling the point of precedency between a louse and a flea"

Turtles, birds & carrion are on the menu for Galeocerdo cuvier, the tiger this

final_jeopardy.clue: Of the 16 Commonwealth nations with Queen Elizabeth II as head of state, this one is farthest from the United Kingdom
